{{Wireless embedded system |brand=AMX |model=NXA-WAP200G |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=10/19/2004 |manuf_country=China |manuf=Lite-On |manuf_model=WP300UP |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point,bridge |fcc_id=PPQWP300UP |ic_id=4491A-WP300UP |pwr_v=5.4 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner=1.25 |pwr_barrel_outer=2 |pwr_barrel_len=7.5 |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Ubicom |cpu1_model=IP2022 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=1 |fla1_brand=SST |fla1_model=39VF080-70-4C-EI |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip1_model=ISL3880 |wi1_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand=Davicom |eth_chip1_model=DM9000E |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=AMX |default_ssid_regex=^AMX$ |default_ip=192.168.1.240 |default_user=Admin |default_pass=1988 |oui=00:02:E3 |oui_eth=00:02:E3 |default_ch= }} [http://www.amx.com/products/NXA-WAP200G.asp Product page]
[http://www.amx.com//assets/manuals/0362799.pdf Manual] "PN:KN1604310" and "WP300UP" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. The adapter included with the device appears to be a '''Leader Electronics''' IU15-2054200-WP (5.4V, 2.0A). ID/OD/Len measurements are approximate. ==Images== File:AMX NXA-WAP200G overview.jpg|overview File:AMX NXA-WAP200G back.jpg|back File:AMX NXA-WAP200G bottom.jpg|bottom [[Has images::external| ]][[Has images::label| ]] File:AMX NXA-WAP200G board top.jpg|board top File:AMX NXA-WAP200G board bot.jpg|board bottom [[Has images::internal| ]]
